Do you have any available hotels in the city center?
I would like to reserve a room at a hotel near the beach

intents.name: Hotel_search
utterances: Can you help me find a hotel in this area?
I am looking for a hotel near the airport

intents.name: Restaurant_search

I want to book a ride to the train station
